abstract: Brazilian director Michel Melamed and Brooklyn-based theater company Magic Futurebox collaborate on production SeeWatchLook, a live immersive theater show featuring quintessential New York characters at the High Line park.
snippet: A show called “SeeWatchLook” presents quintessential New York characters to a sometimes unwitting audience.
lead_paragraph: A show called “SeeWatchLook” presents quintessential New York characters to a sometimes unwitting audience.

headline.main: Sitting on the High Line, Watching the Actors Go By
headline.print_headline: Sitting on the High Line, Watching the Actors Go By
headline.seo: ‘SeeWatchLook’: Street Scenes at the High Line
